trans-unit.source: Represents a control that enumerates table columns that can be filtered.
This type is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>, instead.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: En este tema:

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [Introducción](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [Sintaxis declarativa](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introducción

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control is a control in the ASP.NET Dynamic Data framework.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> trata de un control en el marco de trabajo de datos dinámicos de ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: It automatically renders controls that can be used to filter data rows that are displayed for a table.
trans-unit.target: Representa controles que pueden usarse para filtrar las filas de datos que se muestran para una tabla automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: The filters work by providing a list of `Where` parameters to the data source for each supported column type.
trans-unit.target: Los filtros funcionan proporcionando una lista de `Where` admiten los parámetros para el origen de datos para cada tipo de columna.

trans-unit.source: By default, Dynamic Data filters foreign-key and Boolean columns and renders them by using a `DropDownList` list control.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, los datos dinámicos, filtros de columnas de clave externa y booleanas y presenta utilizando un `DropDownList` control de lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control is a specialized <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control that automatically binds to a collection of filterable columns for the table that is displayed in the current page.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control es un especializado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control que se enlaza automáticamente a una colección de columnas filtrables para la tabla que se muestra en la página actual.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a request is made for /Products/List.aspx, the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control binds to the columns in the Products table.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si se realiza una solicitud para /Products/List.aspx, el <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control se enlaza a las columnas de la tabla Products.

trans-unit.source: The table is chosen based on the route that matches the request.
trans-unit.target: La tabla se elige en función de la ruta que coincida con la solicitud.

trans-unit.source: It can also be overridden by setting the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater.ContextTypeName%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control.
trans-unit.target: También se puede invalidar estableciendo la <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater.TableName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater.ContextTypeName%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control.

trans-unit.source: To display the filter UI, the `ItemTemplate` template of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control must contain a control with a known ID.
trans-unit.target: Para mostrar el filtro de la interfaz de usuario, el `ItemTemplate` plantilla de la <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control debe contener un control con un identificador conocido.

trans-unit.source: By default, the known ID is "DynamicFilter".
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, el identificador conocido es "DynamicFilter".

trans-unit.source: The control in the item template must derive from <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterUserControlBase>.
trans-unit.target: El control en la plantilla de elementos debe derivarse de <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterUserControlBase>.

trans-unit.source: When data binding occurs, the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control initializes an instance of the filter control with information about the column to filter.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se produce el enlace de datos, el <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater> control Inicializa una instancia del control de filtro con información acerca de la columna que se va a filtrar.

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: Sintaxis declarativa

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> class.
Gets or sets the name of the data-source object to use to retrieve the data.
The name of the data source object to use to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: El nombre del objeto de origen de datos se utiliza para recuperar los datos.

trans-unit.source: Binds the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control to the data that is retrieved from a data source.
Gets or sets the ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control in an <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate" /> instance.
The ID of the control used to display the filter UI in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate" /> instance, if an ID is specified; otherwise, "DynamicFilter".
trans-unit.target: El identificador del control utilizado para mostrar el filtro de la interfaz de usuario en el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn.ItemTemplate" /> de instancia, si es de un identificador especificado; en caso contrario, "DynamicFilter".

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumeration of the sortable columns that belong to the table that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control.
An enumeration of the sortable columns that belong to the table that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control.
By default, foreign-key columns and Boolean columns are sortable.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, las columnas de clave externa y las columnas booleanas son que se puede ordenar.

trans-unit.source: The data source of the <see langword="Where" /> parameters.
Gets the list of <see langword="Where" /> parameters to add to the <see langword="Where" /> parameter collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control.
A list of <see langword="Where" /> parameters.
The contents of the item template.
Called for every item and alternating item template that is being instantiated by this <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control during data binding.
You can override this method to customize the contents of the item template while the items are being created.
trans-unit.target: Puede invalidar este método para personalizar el contenido de la plantilla de elementos mientras se crea el elemento.

trans-unit.source: Data is available for each item when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Datos están disponibles para cada elemento cuando se llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated" /> event.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated> event is raised when an item is created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCreated> evento se desencadena cuando se crea un elemento en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the table that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control.
The table that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control.
trans-unit.target: La tabla que está asociada el <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.FilterRepeater" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the table to filter.
The name of the table to filter.
trans-unit.target: El nombre de la tabla que desea filtrar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control is displayed.
<see langword="true" /> if the control is displayed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si se muestra el control; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.
